title: Yeter
overview: Is it bondage? Courage? Aylin, who married the famous and successful surgeon Yekta HarmanlÄ±, whom she met while she was still a university student; As soon as he wakes up from this magical dream, he finds himself in the middle of a nightmare. When she realizes that she can no longer endure the psychological violence she has experienced, she tries to divorce but fails. She has only one purpose when she is pregnant with her second child. Escaping from her husband with her children... While she is telling the big lie that will affect her whole life to her husband, one of her relatives is preparing to betray her.
